dublin_core.dcvalue: Mobile healthcare or m health is an evolutionary concept that provides both mobility and an always connected healthcare functionality The development of this concept depends on how best the available bandwidth in HSDPA HSUPA and emerging Mobile WiMAX networks can be correlated with the relevant medical quality of services issues In this paper we address and discuss some of these issues and challenges We also provide an example of a bandwidth demanding application to verify such provision mechanisms
Conference proceedings : ... Annual International Conference of the IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. IEEE Engineering in Medicine and Biology Society. Annual Conference
Provisioning of medical quality of services for HSDPA and mobile WiMAX in healthcare applications.
